info.name: VivaFemini Backend API
info.description: Complete API documentation for VivaFemini cycle tracking application

request.description: Get all cycles (optionally filtered by userId)
Get current active cycle for a user
Get calendar data with highlighted dates (period, fertile window, ovulation)
Get cycle predictions (fertile window, ovulation window)

Create a new daily log entry

**Physical Pain Symptoms:** Cramps, Diarrhoea, Fatigue, Headache, Nausea, Breast tenderness, Abdominal pain, Pelvic pain, Lower back pain, Appetite changes, Water retention

**Mood & Mental States:** Happy, Neutral, Sad, Low Motivation, Mood swings, Irritability, Cravings, Tearfulness, Difficulty Concentrating

**Period Indicators:** Spotting, heavier flow, lighter flow, Vaginal Dryness

**Sexual Health Indicators:** Increased sex drive, Decreased sex drive, Vaginal discharge
Get all daily logs (optionally filtered by userId)

item.name: Get Daily Logs by Date Range

request.description: Get daily logs within a date range
Get symptom trends and frequency analysis
Get most frequent symptom for a user
Get all activities (optionally filtered by userId)

Log a pregnancy test result

**Result Values:** `positive`, `negative`, `faint_line`, `not_taken`
Get all pregnancy tests (optionally filtered by userId)

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Day 1 Tip",
  "content": "Understand your cycle and take care during peak days.",
  "category": "general",
  "cycleDay": 1,
  "cyclePhase": "menstrual"
}

request.description: Get tips for a specific cycle day

Get tips by cycle phase

**Cycle Phases:** `menstrual`, `follicular`, `ovulation`, `luteal`

body.raw:
{

query.description: Optional: User ID for personalized recommendations

request.description: Get recommended articles for a user

Get comprehensive monthly health report including:
- Cycle summary
- Symptom frequency
- Flow pattern
- Historical logs
- Summary text
- Tips
Get cycle-specific health report summary. Note: Uses query parameter despite path parameter in route.
Get symptom frequency data (percentages for physical pain, mood/mental, digestion/appetite, sexual health)
Get flow pattern graph data (date and intensity pairs)
